content:
/>
Introduction
This topic contains information about the forms claimants must use when submitting an FDC, including
list of forms claimants must use to participate in the FDC Program
use of EZ forms by claimants who do not want to participate in the FDC Program
unique characteristics of the EZ forms
notice claimants receive in
VA Form 21-526EZ, Application for Disability Compensation and Related Compensation Benefits
VA Form 21P-527EZ, Application for Pension
, and
VA Form 21P-534EZ, Application for DIC, Death Pension, and /or Accrued Benefits
handling an incomplete EZ form
, and
handling an unsigned EZ form
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section A - General Information About the Fully Developed Claim (FDC) Program
citation: Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section A
